tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to denial of service via malicious .zip archives in OpenTofu's tofu init, where high CPU usage occurs when processing crafted archives from attacker-controlled sources during module or provider installation, leading to failed or delayed dependency installation and system performance degradation. An attacker can exploit this by serving such archives from a controlled source and coercing an OpenTofu operator to install dependencies from that source, though the vulnerability does not permit arbitrary code execution or data disclosure.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/opentofu/opentofu` library to a patch version.
